Sure, here’s a draft of the article with the additional details you requested:

---

**Title: Simplifying Drag and Drop Functionality in Android Apps**

Drag and drop functionality has become a staple in many Android apps, enhancing user experience and making interactions more intuitive. However, integrating this feature can be challenging, especially when dealing with complex UI designs. In this article, we will explore how to simplify the process of implementing drag and drop functionality in Android apps, focusing on the **DragAndDrop** library, which is currently in **alpha**.

### Introduction
Drag and drop functionality allows users to easily move items within an app, such as images, text, or other UI elements. This feature not only improves user engagement but also enhances the overall usability of the app. However, implementing drag and drop can be a daunting task, especially for developers who are new to Android development.

### Why Use the DragAndDrop Library?
The **DragAndDrop** library simplifies the process of adding drag and drop functionality to your Android app. It provides a robust set of tools and APIs that make it easy to implement drag and drop without the need for extensive coding. The library is currently in **alpha** status, which means it is still under development and may not be fully stable. However, it is a valuable resource for developers who want to experiment with drag and drop functionality and provide feedback to the library's maintainers.

### Getting Started with the DragAndDrop Library
To use the **DragAndDrop** library, you need to follow these steps:

1. **Add the Library to Your Project**: First, add the library to your project by including the following dependency in your `build.gradle` file:
   ```gradle
   implementation 'com.example:draganddrop:1.0.0'
   ```

2. **Set Up the Drag and Drop View**: Next, you need to set up the drag and drop view in your layout XML file. Here’s an example of how to set up a simple drag and drop view:
   ```xml
   <com.example.draganddrop.DragAndDropView
       android:id="@+id/drag_and_drop_view"
       android:layout_width="match_parent"
       android:layout_height="match_parent"
       app:dragSource="@id/source_view"
       app:dragTarget="@id/target_view" />
   ```

3. **Implement the Drag and Drop Logic**: Finally, you need to implement the drag and drop logic in your activity or fragment. Here’s an example of how to handle the drag and drop events:
   ```java
   DragAndDropView dragAndDropView = findViewById(R.id.drag_and_drop_view);
   dragAndDropView.setOnDragListener(new View.OnDragListener() {
       @Override
       public boolean onDrag(View v, DragEvent event) {
           switch (event.getAction()) {
               case DragEvent.ACTION_DRAG_STARTED:
                   // Handle drag start
                   break;
               case DragEvent.ACTION_DRAG_ENTERED:
                   // Handle drag entered
                   break;
               case DragEvent.ACTION_DRAG_EXITED:
                   // Handle drag exited
                   break;
               case DragEvent.ACTION_DROP:
                   View view = (View) event.getLocalState();
                   int sourceId = event.getSource().getId();
                   int targetId = event.getDestination().getId();
                   // Handle the drop event
                   break;
               case DragEvent.ACTION_DRAG_ENDED:
                   // Handle drag end
                   break;
               default:
                   break;
           }
           return true;
       }
   });
   ```

### Encouraging Developer Feedback
We encourage developers to try the **DragAndDrop** library and provide feedback. Your input is invaluable in helping us improve the library and make it more robust. Whether you encounter bugs, have suggestions for new features, or simply want to share your experience, we welcome your feedback. Your contributions will help us make the library better for everyone.

### Conclusion
In conclusion, the **DragAndDrop** library is a valuable tool for simplifying the process of implementing drag and drop functionality in Android apps. While it is currently in **alpha** status, it is a great resource for developers who want to experiment with this feature. We encourage you to try the library and provide feedback to help us improve it.

---

This article should be around 500 words, including the additional details you requested. Let me know if you need any further adjustments.
</response>
gts:
At the most basic level, drag and drop is a gesture where a user can tap and hold an image, text string or other data element, then drag it into another app (or to another location in the same app) and release, where the data is incorporated in the new location. This gesture is usually a long press on touch screens or a click and drag when using a mouse.

A simple drag & drop sample.

While Android has long supported drag and drop ( DragEvent was introduced in Android 3.0, API level 11), integrating full support for handling gestures, events, permissions and callbacks has proven to be complex.

Today we’re introducing the Jetpack DragAndDrop library as an alpha release to make it easier for you to handle data dropped into your app.

Drag and drop is becoming increasingly relevant for large screen form factors: tablet and laptops, but especially also foldables, where split screen is used 7 times as often than on conventional phones. The ability to drag data from one app to another is a natural experience for users as they multitask more efficiently with their apps in split-screen or windowed modes.

While dragging text from EditTexts is supported natively by the platform, we strongly recommend enabling users to drag any images, files or text from other components of your app. Just as importantly, we encourage allowing users to drop data into your apps as well.

Dragging from one app into another.

DropHelper , in combination with DragStartHelper , makes it much easier to take care of gesture support, callbacks, styling and pixel-perfect alignment.

DragStartHelper

DragStartHelper is a utility class in Jetpack core that detects gestures commonly used to start a drag, such as long pressing or click and dragging with a mouse.

DropHelper

The new DropHelper is a utility class that takes care of listeners and drop targets. Be sure to use addInnerEditTexts() when building DropHelper.Options to ensure that any nested EditTexts inside your drop target don’t acquire focus instead.

Learn more

Read more in the Drag and drop guide on Android Developers, dive into the large screen sample to see DropHelper in practice and then try it out in alpha now to give us feedback.

Thanks to Florina, Ben and Nick!

Here’s a professional yet easy-to-understand article about bond cleaning tips for tenants:

### Bond Cleaning Tips for Tenants

Bond cleaning is an essential part of maintaining a property, especially when it comes to bond returns. Here are some practical and cost-saving methods to help you clean your bond without breaking the bank.

#### DIY Bond Cleaning Tips

1. **Use Household Items:**
   - **Vinegar:** Mix equal parts white vinegar and water in a spray bottle. Spray the solution on the bond and let it sit for 10-15 minutes. Wipe it off with a cloth or sponge. Vinegar is a natural degreaser and can remove tough stains.
   - **Baking Soda:** Create a paste with baking soda and water. Apply the paste to the bond and let it sit for 10-15 minutes. Scrub with a soft-bristled brush and rinse with water. Baking soda is gentle on surfaces and can remove dirt and grime.
   - **Bleach:** For stubborn stains, mix a small amount of bleach with water. Test a small area first to ensure it doesn’t damage the bond. Apply the solution and let it sit for 10-15 minutes. Rinse with water and dry thoroughly.

2. **Tools and Equipment:**
   - **Microfiber Cloths:** These are great for cleaning without leaving streaks or lint.
   - **Soft-bristled Brushes:** Use these to scrub hard-to-reach areas.
   - **Sponges:** Choose sponges that are gentle on surfaces and won’t scratch the bond.

3. **Professional Services:**
   - If you prefer to use professional services, look for companies that offer competitive rates and a guarantee on their work. Make sure to ask for references and check reviews.

#### Cost-Saving Tips

- **DIY Saves Money:** By using household items, you can save a significant amount of money compared to hiring professional cleaners.
- **Time-Saving:** DIY cleaning is faster and can be done in your own time, saving you from waiting for professional services.
- **Environmentally Friendly:** Using natural cleaning products is better for the environment and your health.

#### Additional Tips

- **Preventive Maintenance:** Regularly clean the bond to prevent buildup and make cleaning easier.
- **Storage:** Store the bond in a dry, cool place to prevent mold and mildew growth.
- **Check Regulations:** While specific regulations may vary by region (Adelaide/Gold Coast), the general advice provided here should be applicable.

By following these tips, you can keep your bond clean and ensure a smooth bond return process. Remember, a clean bond is a happy tenant!

---

This article should be around 500 words, providing practical advice in a professional yet easy-to-understand tone. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or additional information.
</response>

Christian cross necklaces are more than just jewelry; they are symbols of faith, humility, and love. These simple yet powerful pieces of jewelry have been cherished by men for centuries, serving as a constant reminder of their spiritual journey and commitment to their beliefs.

Sure, here’s a draft for the section on 'Accountability through Real-Time Data':

### Accountability through Real-Time Data

Real-time data plays a crucial role in enhancing accountability within nonprofit organizations. By leveraging advanced accounting software, nonprofits can gain immediate insights into their financial performance, allowing for more proactive decision-making and better alignment with compliance standards. Real-time data enables nonprofits to monitor expenses, revenue, and other financial metrics in real-time, providing a clear picture of their financial health at all times.

One of the key benefits of real-time data is its ability to detect anomalies and potential issues early. For instance, if a nonprofit notices a sudden spike in expenses, they can investigate the cause immediately and take corrective actions before the situation spirals out of control. This proactive approach not only helps in maintaining financial integrity but also builds trust with stakeholders, including donors and funders.

Moreover, real-time data facilitates better communication between different departments within the organization. For example, the finance team can share real-time financial reports with the program managers, ensuring that all departments are aligned and working towards the same financial goals. This transparency helps in identifying any discrepancies or inefficiencies early on, allowing for timely adjustments and improvements.

In terms of compliance with GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principles) and FASB (Financial Accounting Standards Board) standards, real-time data is invaluable. Accounting software can automatically generate financial statements based on real-time data, ensuring that the financial reports are accurate and up-to-date. This automation reduces the risk of human error and ensures that the financial data aligns with the latest accounting standards.

Additionally, real-time data allows nonprofits to track their spending against budgeted amounts in real-time. This feature is particularly useful for nonprofits that operate on tight budgets. By monitoring spending in real-time, nonprofits can identify areas where they are overspending and make necessary adjustments to stay within budget. This not only helps in maintaining financial discipline but also ensures that the organization is using its resources efficiently.

In conclusion, real-time data is a powerful tool for enhancing accountability within nonprofit organizations. By providing immediate insights into financial performance, real-time data helps in detecting anomalies early, improving communication between departments, and ensuring compliance with GAAP and FASB standards. As a result, nonprofits can build trust with stakeholders, maintain financial integrity, and operate more efficiently.

Nonprofits and government agencies need nonprofit accounting software to demonstrate accountability and compliance. Let’s take a deep dive into what you need to know in choosing the most compliant software.

A compliant nonprofit accounting software system tracks revenue to a designated purpose and prevents misuse of donations.

If a nonprofit wants to be compliant with GAAP and FASB 116/117, all of their funds must be grouped into two categories of net assets: (1) without donor restrictions and (2) net assets with donor restrictions, which replace the three former categories of unrestricted, temporarily restricted and permanently restricted net assets. To be GAAP-compliant, nonprofits only need two funds to report on the breakdown of net assets on IRS form 990.

Nonprofit Accounting Software Identifies Who, What and Why

In order to fully understand why nonprofits need nonprofit accounting, you need to understand three fundamental questions:

Who is the source of revenue? What is the designated purpose? Why nonprofits need to classify revenue?

1. Who is the source of revenue?

Who identifies the source of revenue and provider of services and expenses. This is know as donor designated revenue. Who is donating or granting funds to the nonprofit? Who is the nonprofit paying expenses, such as salaries, payroll taxes, services, rent, utilities?

Sure, here’s a draft for a short article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on debunking the idea that blockchain is only for criminals and explaining how it can improve transparency:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Public Services**

Blockchain technology has gained significant attention in recent years, particularly in the realm of cryptocurrencies. However, there is a common misconception that blockchain is only used by criminals and is not beneficial for the public sector. This article aims to debunk this myth and highlight how blockchain can actually improve transparency and efficiency in public services, especially in areas like land record management and welfare distribution.

### Land Record Management

Land records are a critical aspect of public administration, and ensuring their accuracy and integrity is crucial. Traditional land record management systems are prone to errors and fraud, as they rely heavily on manual processes and paper-based records. Blockchain technology can revolutionize this process by providing a secure, tamper-proof ledger that can be accessed by authorized personnel only.

By implementing a blockchain-based system for land records, the government can ensure that every transaction is recorded and verified in real-time. This not only reduces the risk of fraud but also enhances transparency. For example, when a land transaction occurs, the details are immediately recorded on the blockchain, and all parties involved can access the updated record. This ensures that the land records are always up-to-date and accurate, making it difficult for anyone to alter the records without detection.

### Welfare Distribution

Welfare distribution is another area where blockchain can make a significant impact. Corruption and inefficiencies in the welfare distribution system are well-documented, and blockchain can help address these issues. By using a blockchain-based system, the government can ensure that welfare benefits are distributed accurately and transparently.

For instance, when a welfare benefit is issued, the details are recorded on the blockchain, and the recipient’s identity is verified using a secure digital identity system. This ensures that the benefit is only distributed to the intended recipient and reduces the risk of fraud. Additionally, the blockchain can track the entire distribution process, from the issuance of the benefit to its delivery, providing a complete audit trail. This transparency helps build trust among beneficiaries and reduces the likelihood of corruption.

### Reducing Corruption

Blockchain technology can also help reduce corruption in government schemes. By creating a transparent and immutable record of transactions, blockchain can prevent the misuse of public funds. For example, when a government scheme is implemented, the details of the funds allocated and spent are recorded on the blockchain. This ensures that the funds are used as intended and reduces the risk of misappropriation.

Moreover, blockchain can enable a more efficient and accountable public sector. By automating certain processes and reducing the need for intermediaries, blockchain can streamline public services and reduce administrative costs. This not only improves the efficiency of public services but also reduces the burden on taxpayers.

### Conclusion

Blockchain technology has the potential to transform public services in India by enhancing transparency and reducing corruption. By implementing blockchain-based systems in areas like land record management and welfare distribution, the government can ensure that public services are more efficient, accountable, and trustworthy. As more countries adopt blockchain technology, it is essential to continue exploring its potential in public administration and to address any challenges that may arise.

---

This article provides a clear and concise overview of how blockchain can improve transparency and efficiency in public services. It includes specific examples that policymakers can easily understand and apply.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Here’s a concise article about why cosigning loans is risky, focusing on the analogy of betting on a losing horse and the financial implications:

### Why Cosigning Loans is Risky: The Analogy of Betting on a Losing Horse

Cosigning a loan is akin to betting on a losing horse. Just as a bettor risks their money on a horse that has a proven track record of underperforming, a cosigner risks their financial well-being on a borrower who has a history of financial instability. This analogy highlights the predictable risks associated with cosigning loans.

#### Predictable Risks

When you cosign a loan, you are essentially taking on the financial responsibility of the borrower. If the borrower defaults on the loan, you are the one who will be held liable. This is particularly true if the borrower has a proven track record of financial failure. For example, if you cosign a loan for a friend who has a history of late payments and defaults, you could face wage garnishment, tax refund garnishment, or even legal action to recover the debt.

#### Financial Implications

The financial implications of cosigning a loan are significant. If the borrower defaults, you will be responsible for repaying the full amount of the loan. This can lead to a significant financial burden, especially if you have other financial obligations. Additionally, cosigning a loan can damage your credit score, making it harder for you to secure loans or credit in the future.

#### Conclusion

Cosigning a loan is a risky proposition, especially when the borrower has a proven track record of financial instability. The financial implications can be severe, including wage garnishment and damage to your credit score. It is crucial to carefully consider the risks before cosigning a loan, especially if you are unsure about the borrower's financial situation.

---

This article should provide a clear and concise overview of the risks associated with cosigning loans, focusing on the analogy of betting on a losing horse and the financial implications.
</response>
gts:
Personal Finance

Don’t Cosign A Loan, Don’t Bet On A Losing Horse

Photo by DDP on Unsplash

Worried about cosigning a loan for someone in need? To help you make the decision easier, remember that people who require cosigners often miss payments and have poor credit. They have a history that depicts poor financial decision-making.

The reason people need a cosign is because they can’t do it alone without your help; they need you. The question is, are you willing to take a chance on the Detroit Lions, whose record is 2 wins-12 losses-1 tie. I wouldn’t.

Yes, we take risks when we make investments, but consigning a loan is not the same thing — it’s entirely different. You’re investing in someone who has already shown you a record of failing financials. In the startup world, this is a major red flag.

Choosing not to help your best friend or sibling get a new car, take out a personal loan, or get a credit card is disheartening — especially if you have the means to help.

What happens if they start missing payments? What happens if they decide they can’t make any payments and you’re stuck with the payments? Will you be okay with that?

Here’s a short article about how businesses can speed up their accounting processes with software solutions, including a specific tool and a call-to-action:

### How to Speed Up Your Accounting Processes with Software Solutions

In today's fast-paced business environment, efficient accounting is crucial for maintaining financial health and ensuring timely decision-making. One of the most effective ways to streamline your accounting processes is by leveraging advanced software solutions. These tools not only automate repetitive tasks but also provide real-time insights and analytics, enabling businesses to make informed decisions quickly.

#### Key Software Solutions for Accelerating Accounting Processes

1. **Automated Accounting Software**: Tools like QuickBooks, Xero, and Zoho Books offer robust features for managing accounts receivable, accounts payable, and general ledger. These platforms automate invoicing, payment processing, and reconciliation, reducing manual errors and saving time.

2. **Cloud-Based Accounting Software**: Cloud solutions like FreshBooks and Wave provide seamless integration with other business tools, such as project management software and CRM systems. This integration allows for real-time data synchronization, ensuring that financial data is always up-to-date and accessible from anywhere.

3. **Mobile Accounting Apps**: For businesses that frequently need to send invoices and track unpaid invoices, mobile apps like Ola Books are invaluable. These apps allow you to send invoices directly from your mobile device, track payment statuses, and even set up automatic reminders. The mobile app also includes a feature to send payment requests to customers, ensuring timely payments and reducing the risk of overdue invoices.

#### The Ola Books Mobile App: A Comprehensive Solution

Ola Books is a powerful mobile accounting app designed to help businesses manage their finances more efficiently. Here are some key features of the Ola Books mobile app:

- **Invoicing and Payment Tracking**: Easily create and send invoices to customers via the mobile app. The app also allows you to track payment statuses in real-time, helping you stay on top of overdue invoices.
- **Mobile Payment Requests**: Send payment requests directly to customers, ensuring that they receive reminders and have the option to pay online or through the app.
- **Integration with Other Tools**: Ola Books integrates seamlessly with other business tools, such as project management software and CRM systems, providing a comprehensive view of your financial data.
- **Real-Time Data Syncing**: Real-time data syncing ensures that your financial data is always up-to-date, making it easier to make informed decisions.

#### The ‘Switch to Ola Books’ Call-to-Action

If you're looking to streamline your accounting processes and take advantage of the latest technology, we highly recommend switching to Ola Books. Our mobile app is designed to help businesses of all sizes manage their finances more efficiently, from invoicing and payment tracking to real-time data syncing.

**Switch to Ola Books**  
[Click here to learn more](https://www.ola-books.com)

By leveraging Ola Books and other advanced software solutions, businesses can significantly speed up their accounting processes, reduce manual errors, and make better financial decisions. Whether you're a small business owner or a large enterprise, Ola Books has the tools you need to take your accounting to the next level.

You can monitor in real-time your bank balances, invoices, and bills and compare year-over-year results. This can help you make informed decisions and grow your business.

Sure, here’s a concise draft of the article:

### Atrangi Re: A Masterclass in Acting and Music, with Flaws

**Praise for Dhanush's Acting and AR Rahman's Music**

Atrangi Re is a cinematic masterpiece that elevates the art of acting and music to new heights. Dhanush's performance as the protagonist is nothing short of exceptional. His nuanced portrayal of a man torn between his duty and his heart is both compelling and emotionally resonant. Dhanush's ability to convey the character's internal struggles through subtle facial expressions and body language is commendable. His chemistry with the supporting cast, particularly with Priyanka Chopra, is electric and adds a layer of depth to the film.

AR Rahman's score is a true gem. The music is a perfect blend of traditional Indian melodies and contemporary beats, creating a unique and immersive auditory experience. Rahman's ability to capture the essence of the film's themes through his compositions is remarkable. The use of traditional instruments like the sitar and tabla adds a rich cultural dimension to the soundtrack, making it a standout feature of the movie.

**Addressing the Flaws**

**Tamil Stereotypes and Cultural Clichés**

One of the most cringe-worthy aspects of Atrangi Re is the over-the-top Tamilnadu sequence. The accents are exaggerated, and the portrayal of Tamil traditions is overly simplistic and clichéd. This approach fails to capture the nuanced and diverse nature of Tamil culture, which is a significant drawback. The film could have benefited from a more authentic and respectful depiction of Tamil traditions, avoiding the pitfalls of cultural appropriation.

**Mental Health Subplot**

The film's mental health subplot is another area where it falls short. The character of Dr. Raju, played by Dhanush, is a doctor who struggles with his own mental health. However, the portrayal of this character is oversimplified and poorly resolved. The film mishandles the topic, reducing it to a one-dimensional narrative that fails to explore the complexities of mental health issues. This oversimplification not only undermines the seriousness of the subject but also fails to provide a meaningful resolution to the character's struggles.

In conclusion, Atrangi Re is a film that excels in its acting and music, but it struggles with cultural representation and mental health portrayal. Dhanush's performance and AR Rahman's score are highlights, but the film could have been more nuanced and respectful in its approach to these critical aspects.
</response>
gts:
I hate Dhanush’s forced humility off screen for obvious reasons but Dhanush on screen is a powerhouse performer. "Atrangi Re" is another testimony to his outstanding acting ability. He makes you laugh when he laughs, he makes you cry when he cries. He is such a terrific actor.

As revealed in the trailer, the movie is about a forced marriage and the aftermath the couple face because of the same. The movie has an interesting plot that can make anyone say "wow" but the screenplay lacks big-time. The movie as a whole was a middling affair that solely relies on performance of the actors.

Sara Ali Khan played her character to perfect while Akshay Kumar was just decent. ARR is the hero behind the screens for the movie. His songs and soulful BGM is what promotes the movie from being average to decent/good. Particularly loved the "Little Little" sequence in the movie. Imo, the best 10 minutes in the movie.

The movie has equal shortcomings to that of the positives. The lack of engaging screenplay, irking logical loopholes, stereotyping tamils(though it's not new in a Bollywood movie, the entire Tamilnadu sequence was a turn off) and inadequate character background are some of the shortcomings of the movie. It's as if the director who wrote terrific first half didn't know how to end the movie in second half.

~Overall, a decent movie that falls short in the latter half. Watch it for Dhanush and AR Rahman.

P.S. : There is some serious ill handled mental issue concept that is sure to stir up arguments in the coming days. Dhanush being a doctor in the movie, it was baffling the way it was treated in the movie.

Here is a draft article for eMarketer about how middle-market brands can use alternative DSPs to overcome programmatic advertising challenges:

---

**How Middle-Market Brands Can Use Alternative DSPs to Overcome Programmatic Advertising Challenges**

With a total programmatic spend of $133 billion and a 91% media mix share, programmatic advertising has become a cornerstone of digital marketing. However, the 'minimums' set by DSP platforms like MediaMath and Trade Desk can be a significant barrier for middle-market brands. These minimums often require brands to meet certain spend thresholds to access premium inventory, which can be prohibitive for smaller budgets.

### Alternative DSPs: A Solution for Middle-Market Brands

Alternative DSPs offer a viable solution for middle-market brands looking to leverage programmatic advertising without the constraints of minimum spend requirements. These platforms often have more flexible pricing models and can provide access to a broader range of inventory, including premium and lower-tier inventory.

#### Benefits of Alternative DSPs

1. **Flexibility in Spend**: Alternative DSPs allow middle-market brands to set their own budgets and spend as they see fit. This flexibility is particularly beneficial for brands with fluctuating budgets or those that want to allocate funds to specific campaigns or channels.

2. **Access to a Broader Range of Inventory**: Many alternative DSPs offer access to a wider range of inventory, including premium and lower-tier inventory. This can help middle-market brands reach a more diverse audience and improve the overall effectiveness of their campaigns.

3. **Customization and Targeting Options**: Alternative DSPs often provide advanced targeting options and customization features that can help middle-market brands create more targeted and effective campaigns. This can lead to better ROI and higher conversion rates.

#### Case Study: A Successful Implementation

Consider a middle-market brand that wanted to run a targeted advertising campaign for a new product launch. They used an alternative DSP that offered flexible pricing and access to premium inventory. By setting a budget of $50,000, they were able to reach a broad audience and drive significant engagement. The campaign was highly successful, with a 20% higher conversion rate compared to a traditional DSP that required a minimum spend of $100,000.

### Conclusion

Alternative DSPs provide middle-market brands with a flexible and cost-effective solution to overcome programmatic advertising challenges. By leveraging these platforms, brands can access a broader range of inventory, set their own budgets, and create more targeted and effective campaigns. As the programmatic market continues to evolve, alternative DSPs will become an increasingly important tool for brands of all sizes.

---

This draft is under 500 words and should meet the user's requirements.
</response>
gts:
DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

Brittany Wray shares insights on programmatic advertising and its influence on marketing. She highlights the outcomes derived from the said technique creating a win-win situation for all. If you look at most leading indicators for programmatic digital advertising, the trends point steadily upwards with DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands. The latest forecast from eMarketer projects that marketers will spend more dollars on programmatic ($133B), that it will account for a greater share of the media mix (91%), and that a growing and increasingly premium share of available inventory will be transacted programmatically.

It’s Only Middlemen for The Middle Market — Major brands and agencies have long mastered the ins and outs of programmatic tech. Reading the industry trades, one could easily assume that the vast majority of advertisers have followed suit. The simple reason is that they don’t spend enough money on their own to meet the minimums for leading DSPs like MediaMath and The Trade Desk. These arbitrary minimums have excluded the majority of advertisers from the programmatic advertising technology.

It’s a lost opportunity for everyone. These budget minimums have limited the middle market’s autonomy and curtailed its ability to bring advertising operations under their own control. They have disincentivized these companies from developing the talent and budgeting the resources necessary to master this technology and get the most value from it. And they have kept the major DSPs from accessing the largest, most diversified, and therefore most durable segment of advertisers. Instead, middle market companies rely on media agencies (like my company, AudienceX) to manage their digital budgets, essentially acting as surrogate operators of this DSP technology. On the surface, that would seem to benefit digital agencies like us, but in the long run I’m not sure it benefits anyone.

For more such updates, check Out recent Martech Cube guest blogs.

Here is the revised article based on your request:

### Global Short Bowel Syndrome Market

The global short bowel syndrome (SBS) market was valued at approximately $612 million in 2019, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 27% from 2015 to 2023. Key drivers of this growth include inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) and increased government healthcare spending.

#### Main Drivers

1. **Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)**: IBD is a leading cause of SBS, with Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis being the most common forms. The rising incidence of IBD, coupled with advancements in treatment options, has driven market growth.
   
2. **Government Healthcare Spending**: Increased government funding for healthcare has led to better access to medical treatments and research initiatives focused on SBS. This has not only improved patient outcomes but also boosted the market.

#### Market Overview

The SBS market is expected to reach $5.2 billion by 2028, growing at a CAGR of 10.5% from 2022 to 2028. Key market players include pharmaceutical companies, medical device manufacturers, and research institutions.

#### Oley Foundation

The Oley Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to SBS research and patient support, has been instrumental in advancing the field. The foundation has funded numerous studies and provided resources to improve patient care.

#### Other Associations

While the Oley Foundation is mentioned in the article, the other associations you requested (Association of Gastrointestinal Motility and SBS Cure Project) are also important players in the SBS community. These organizations contribute to research, advocacy, and patient support.

For more detailed information, you may want to visit the websites of these associations:
- **Association of Gastrointestinal Motility**: [www.gastromotility.org](http://www.gastromotility.org)
- **SBS Cure Project**: [www.sbscureproject.org](http://www.sbscureproject.org)

Thank you for your feedback. If you have any further requests or need additional information, feel free to ask.
</response>

**Pre-Wedding Photoshoots in the Andaman Islands: A Special Bonding Experience**

The Andaman Islands offer a unique blend of natural beauty and adventure, making it an ideal location for pre-wedding photoshoots. Whether you're looking to capture stunning landscapes or thrilling experiences, the Andaman Islands have something for every couple. This article will highlight why the Andaman Islands are special and how you can make the most of your pre-wedding photoshoot.

### Why the Andaman Islands are Special

The Andaman Islands are a tropical paradise, known for their crystal-clear waters, pristine beaches, and diverse marine life. The islands offer a perfect setting for pre-wedding photoshoots, with breathtaking views and a range of activities to choose from. Here are some reasons why the Andaman Islands are a special choice:

#### Scuba Diving
Scuba diving is a must-do activity in the Andaman Islands. The waters are teeming with colorful coral reefs and a variety of marine life, including turtles, dolphins, and even manta rays. Couples can explore the underwater world together, creating memories that will last a lifetime. The clear visibility allows for stunning underwater shots, perfect for capturing the essence of the Andaman Islands.

#### Parasailing
Parasailing is another thrilling activity that adds excitement to your photoshoot. Couples can soar above the water, taking in the stunning views of the Andaman Islands. The high vantage point provides a unique perspective, allowing you to capture the beauty of the islands from a different angle. Parasailing is a great way to create memorable moments and add a touch of adventure to your photos.

### Emphasizing the Bonding Experience

The Andaman Islands are not just about the photoshoot; they are also about creating unforgettable moments for couples. Here are some ways to emphasize the bonding experience:

#### Shared Adventures
Include adventurous activities that require teamwork and communication. Scuba diving and parasailing are great examples of activities that require close collaboration. These shared experiences will strengthen your bond and create lasting memories.

#### Personalized Photoshoots
Offer personalized photoshoots that cater to your interests and preferences. Whether you prefer a more traditional shoot or a more adventurous one, the Andaman Islands can accommodate your needs. Personalized photoshoots allow you to create a unique experience that reflects your relationship.

#### Group Activities
Encourage group activities that promote bonding. Consider organizing group games or team-building exercises during the photoshoot. This will not only make the experience more enjoyable but also strengthen your relationship.

### Additive Manufacturing in Dubai: A Focus on Scalability and Efficiency in the Automobile Industry

Dubai has emerged as a global leader in additive manufacturing (AM), particularly in the automobile industry. The city’s strategic 3D Printing Strategy, launched in 2019, aims to leverage AM for rapid prototyping, production, and customization. This strategy has been instrumental in driving innovation and efficiency in the automotive sector.

One of the key benefits of AM in Dubai is its ability to reduce production times significantly. For instance, Inoventive, a leading 3D printing company in the region, has demonstrated impressive production times of just a few hours for complex automotive components. This rapid turnaround is crucial for the automobile industry, where time-to-market is a critical factor.

Inoventive’s capabilities are particularly noteworthy. They have successfully printed high-strength metal parts for automotive applications, showcasing the potential of AM in enhancing the performance and durability of vehicles. These parts are not only lighter but also more resistant to wear and tear, which is essential for the longevity of vehicles.

The scalability of AM in Dubai is another significant advantage. The city’s infrastructure and skilled workforce have enabled the adoption of AM across various industries, including automotive. This has led to a more efficient supply chain, where components can be produced locally, reducing transportation costs and time.

Moreover, the use of AM in Dubai has contributed to sustainability efforts in the automobile industry. By reducing the need for raw materials and minimizing waste, AM helps in lowering the carbon footprint of automotive production. For example, the use of recycled materials in 3D printing can significantly reduce the environmental impact of manufacturing processes.

In conclusion, Dubai’s 3D Printing Strategy has positioned the city as a hub for AM innovation in the automobile industry. The rapid production times and scalability of AM, coupled with its sustainability benefits, make it an attractive option for automotive manufacturers looking to enhance their production processes. Companies like Inoventive are leading the way in demonstrating the practical applications of AM, paving the way for a more efficient and sustainable future in the automotive sector.
</response>

Sure, here’s a concise 500-word article on the top 5 Samsung smartphones from 2021:

### Top 5 Samsung Smartphones from 2021

#### Introduction
Samsung, founded in 1928 as a grocery store, has since risen to become a global tech giant. In 2021, Samsung released several flagship models that set new standards in the smartphone market. This article highlights the top 5 Samsung smartphones from that year, focusing on key specs, unique features, and standout camera and battery performance.

#### 1. Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a powerhouse of a smartphone, boasting a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It features a 120MP main camera, a 10MP ultra-wide camera, and a 12MP telephoto camera, providing excellent low-light performance and wide-angle shots. The Ultra also includes a 4800mAh battery, which offers up to 24 hours of video playback on a single charge. One of its unique features is the 120x zoom capability, making it a favorite among professional photographers.

#### 2. Samsung Galaxy S21+
The Samsung Galaxy S21+ is a balanced option with a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 120Hz refresh rate. It comes with a 12MP main camera, a 12MP ultra-wide camera, and a 64MP telephoto camera, offering a versatile camera setup. The S21+ has a 4500mAh battery, providing up to 18 hours of video playback on a single charge. Its software features, including the One UI 3.1, make it a smooth and intuitive device for general readers.

#### 3. Samsung Galaxy S21
The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a mid-range flagship with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 120Hz refresh rate. It features a 12MP main camera, a 12MP ultra-wide camera, and a 64MP telephoto camera, providing good low-light performance and wide-angle shots. The S21 has a 4000mAh battery, offering up to 14 hours of video playback on a single charge. Its software, One UI 3.1, is user-friendly and includes features like the Always-On Display.

#### 4. Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2
The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2 is a foldable smartphone that combines the best of both worlds. It features a 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is powered by a Snapdragon 865+ processor and runs on One UI 3.1. The Z Fold 2 has a 4500mAh battery, providing up to 18 hours of video playback on a single charge. Its unique feature is the ability to fold the screen, making it a versatile device for both work and entertainment.

#### 5. Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip is a compact and stylish foldable smartphone. It features a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is powered by a Snapdragon 865+ processor and runs on One UI 3.1. The Z Flip has a 3300mAh battery, providing up to 12 hours of video playback on a single charge. Its unique feature is the ability to fold the screen, making it a fashionable and portable device.

#### Conclusion
Samsung’s flagship smartphones from 2021 are packed with advanced features and high-quality cameras. Whether you prefer a foldable device like the Galaxy Z Fold 2 or a more traditional smartphone like the Galaxy S21, Samsung offers a range of options to suit different needs and preferences. With a rich history and a commitment to innovation, Samsung continues to be a leader in the smartphone market.
</response>

Here’s a short article about how businesses can speed up their accounting processes with software solutions, including a specific tool and a call-to-action:

### How to Speed Up Your Accounting Processes with Software Solutions

In today's fast-paced business environment, efficient accounting is crucial for maintaining financial health and ensuring timely decision-making. One of the most effective ways to streamline your accounting processes is by leveraging advanced software solutions. These tools not only automate repetitive tasks but also provide real-time insights and analytics, enabling businesses to make informed decisions quickly.

#### Key Software Solutions for Accelerating Accounting Processes

1. **Automated Accounting Software**: Tools like QuickBooks, Xero, and Zoho Books offer robust features for managing accounts receivable, accounts payable, and general ledger. These platforms automate invoicing, payment processing, and reconciliation, reducing manual errors and saving time.

2. **Cloud-Based Accounting Software**: Cloud solutions like FreshBooks and Wave provide seamless integration with other business tools, such as project management software and CRM systems. This integration allows for real-time data synchronization, ensuring that financial data is always up-to-date and accessible from anywhere.

3. **Mobile Accounting Apps**: For businesses that frequently need to send invoices and track unpaid invoices, mobile apps like Ola Books are invaluable. These apps allow you to send invoices directly from your mobile device, track payment statuses, and even set up automatic reminders. The mobile app also includes a feature to send payment requests to customers, ensuring timely payments and reducing the risk of overdue invoices.

#### The Ola Books Mobile App: A Comprehensive Solution

Ola Books is a powerful mobile accounting app designed to help businesses manage their finances more efficiently. Here are some key features of the Ola Books mobile app:

- **Invoicing and Payment Tracking**: Easily create and send invoices to customers via the mobile app. The app also allows you to track payment statuses in real-time, helping you stay on top of overdue invoices.
- **Mobile Payment Requests**: Send payment requests directly to customers, ensuring that they receive reminders and have the option to pay online or through the app.
- **Integration with Other Tools**: Ola Books integrates seamlessly with other business tools, such as project management software and CRM systems, providing a comprehensive view of your financial data.
- **Real-Time Data Syncing**: Real-time data syncing ensures that your financial data is always up-to-date, making it easier to make informed decisions.

#### The ‘Switch to Ola Books’ Call-to-Action

If you're looking to streamline your accounting processes and take advantage of the latest technology, we highly recommend switching to Ola Books. Our mobile app is designed to help businesses of all sizes manage their finances more efficiently, from invoicing and payment tracking to real-time data syncing.

**Switch to Ola Books**  
[Click here to learn more](https://www.ola-books.com)

By leveraging Ola Books and other advanced software solutions, businesses can significantly speed up their accounting processes, reduce manual errors, and make better financial decisions. Whether you're a small business owner or a large enterprise, Ola Books has the tools you need to take your accounting to the next level.

This article provides a concise overview of how businesses can speed up their accounting processes with software solutions, including a specific tool and a call-to-action. We hope you find this information helpful.

**Repossession: A Social Critique of Class Tensions and Materialism**

In the chilling world of 'Repossession,' director Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard have crafted a horror film that not only captivates with its spine-chilling premise but also serves as a powerful social critique. Set in a near-future where the lines between the haves and have-nots are increasingly blurred, 'Repossession' draws inspiration from the acclaimed films 'Get Out' and 'Parasite,' offering a fresh take on the themes of class tensions and materialism.

The film opens with a hauntingly familiar scene: a young woman, played by a talented newcomer, is led into a seemingly ordinary apartment by a mysterious figure. However, as she steps inside, the reality of her situation becomes clear. The apartment is not just a home but a trap, designed to exploit her vulnerabilities and strip her of her identity. This scene is a direct homage to the opening of 'Get Out,' where the protagonist is led into a house that is slowly consuming her sense of self.

The social critique in 'Repossession' is further emphasized through the film's exploration of materialism. The protagonist, played by a seasoned actress, is a successful businesswoman who has everything she could ever want. However, her life is not without its flaws. The film delves into the darker aspects of her life, revealing a world where material possessions are not just a means of survival but a source of obsession and control. This mirrors the themes explored in 'Parasite,' where the wealthy family's obsession with status and possessions leads to their downfall.

The film's festival buzz is a testament to its powerful storytelling and social commentary. Critics have praised 'Repossession' for its originality and its ability to tackle complex social issues in a way that is both thought-provoking and entertaining. The film has been selected for several prestigious film festivals, including the Sundance Film Festival, where it received critical acclaim.

The film's directors, Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, bring a unique perspective to the horror genre. Both directors have a strong background in filmmaking and have worked on several critically acclaimed projects. Their collaboration on 'Repossession' has resulted in a film that is not only a thrilling horror experience but also a powerful commentary on our society.

'Repossession' is set to release on December 2021 and will be distributed by Gravitas Ventures. The film's release is expected to generate significant buzz and interest, making it a must-see for horror fans and those interested in social commentary.

---

This article highlights the social critique angle, festival buzz, and director/producer credits while maintaining a tight and hype-driven tone.

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure, here’s a concise article on the pros and cons of having an online business, including a short conclusion with actionable tips:

### Pros of Having an Online Business

1. **Global Reach**: With an online business, you can reach customers worldwide, expanding your market potential.
2. **Flexibility**: You can work from anywhere, allowing for a better work-life balance.
3. **Cost Efficiency**: Lower overhead costs compared to traditional brick-and-mortar stores.
4. **24/7 Availability**: Your business is always open, allowing for continuous customer service.

### Cons of Having an Online Business

1. **Competition**: The online market is highly competitive, making it challenging to stand out.
2. **Technical Issues**: Dependence on technology can lead to downtime and security concerns.
3. **Customer Trust**: Building trust with customers can be more difficult in an online environment.

### Conclusion

1. **Time-Blocking for Work-Life Balance**: Allocate specific times for work and personal activities to maintain a healthy balance.
2. **Budget-Friendly Tools**: Use free or low-cost tools like Google Analytics for SEO, and consider using open-source software for development.
3. **Continuous Learning**: Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies to stay ahead in the online marketplace.

By implementing these tips, you can mitigate the challenges of running an online business and maximize its benefits.
</response>
gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Here’s an article under 500 words about whether politicians should stay out of the crypto debate:

### The Case for Political Oversight in the Crypto Debate

In recent years, cryptocurrencies have emerged as a disruptive force in the financial landscape. While some argue that politicians should stay out of the crypto debate, the reality is that oversight is necessary to mitigate the risks and ensure the stability of traditional currencies and economies. This article will explore three key areas where political action is essential: the potential impact on traditional currencies, the economic implications, and security concerns.

#### Traditional Currencies Will Suffer

Cryptocurrencies have the potential to disrupt the traditional financial system. If left unchecked, they could undermine the stability of national currencies. For example, in 2017, the value of Bitcoin surged to over $20,000, causing significant volatility in the global financial markets. This rapid price fluctuation can lead to economic instability and inflationary pressures. In response, central banks and governments have taken steps to regulate cryptocurrencies. However, without political oversight, the regulatory framework can be inconsistent and ineffective, leading to market manipulation and financial instability.

A real-world example of the impact of crypto on traditional currencies is El Salvador’s decision to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender. While this move was intended to provide financial inclusion to the country’s poor population, it also raised concerns about the stability of the Salvadoran currency, the Sol. In 2021, the Sol depreciated by over 50%, leading to economic hardship for many Salvadorans. This scenario highlights the need for political oversight to ensure that cryptocurrencies do not undermine the stability of traditional currencies.

#### Economies Will Suffer

The economic implications of crypto are equally concerning. If left unchecked, cryptocurrencies can lead to economic instability and a loss of confidence in the traditional financial system. For instance, in 2018, the Chinese government imposed strict regulations on the cryptocurrency market, leading to a significant drop in the value of Bitcoin and other altcoins. This crackdown had a ripple effect on the global economy, as many investors and businesses were forced to liquidate their crypto holdings, leading to a loss of capital and economic disruption.

Another example is the case of Venezuela, where the government has been using cryptocurrencies as a means to circumvent international sanctions. However, this approach has led to hyperinflation and economic collapse. In 2018, the Venezuelan bolívar lost over 99% of its value, leaving many citizens without access to basic necessities. This situation underscores the importance of political oversight to prevent the misuse of cryptocurrencies and protect the economic stability of nations.

#### Security Concerns

Security is another critical area where political action is necessary. Cryptocurrencies are vulnerable to hacking and other cyber threats, which can lead to significant financial losses. For example, in 2014, the Mt. Gox exchange suffered a massive hack, resulting in the loss of over $450 million worth of Bitcoin. This incident highlighted the need for robust cybersecurity measures to protect both individual users and the broader financial system.

In 2019, the United States Department of Justice indicted 14 individuals for their role in the hack of the DAO, a decentralized autonomous organization. This case demonstrates the importance of political action in addressing cyber threats and holding perpetrators accountable. Without political oversight, the financial system would be at greater risk of cyber attacks, leading to financial losses and reputational damage.

### Conclusion

In conclusion, the risks associated with cryptocurrencies require political action to mitigate their potential negative impacts. By providing oversight and regulation, governments can ensure the stability of traditional currencies, protect the economic interests of their citizens, and prevent the misuse of cryptocurrencies. Real-world examples such as El Salvador’s Bitcoin adoption and China’s crackdowns on the crypto market illustrate the need for political intervention. Therefore, it is clear that politicians should not stay out of the crypto debate and must take a proactive role in shaping the regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies.

---

This article aims to provide a balanced view, leaning toward the argument that oversight is necessary to mitigate the risks outlined. It includes real-world examples to ground the analysis and maintain a balanced tone.
</response>
gts:
Just a few days ago Hillary Clinton expressed her opinions on cryptocurrency… Spoiler alert, she is not a fan of cryptocurrencies for a variety of reasons. However her concerns raise valid questions that pose answers we could all learn from.

Understanding the technology behind crypto is critical to making smarter investment decisions. Become a blockchain ninja today!

Traditional Currencies Will Suffer

One of Hillary’s main concerns were that cryptocurrency will eventually become too widespread. The most prominent issue that could arise from a widespread transition to crypto, is the potential for traditional currencies to seize in place of cryptocurrencies. This doesn't sound too awful at first, however this transition could spark a chain reaction that disrupts the economy of entire countries.

Economies Will Suffer

The problem becomes much more serious, if in theory cryptocurrency effectively becomes the norm putting traditional currencies in the back seat. The adoption to cryptocurrency has come at alarming rates, and many countries are already struggling to figure out how to keep up. While countries like El Salvador have adjusted to the crypto evolution quite fast, by building a Bitcoin city. Many smaller countries with less stable economies could potentially suffer the most if they are unable to come up with a valid solution.

Security Concerns

Many people fear that having large portions of a country’s wealth stored in crypto could be a security risk for getting hacked. This is certainly a valid concern with many data leaks and interferences by foreign nations already being quite prevalent. With crypto there is even more incentive for hackers because they could directly impact the economy of an entire country.

Conclusion

It is difficult to say which concerns are the most valid, and what issues deserve the most attention. However many of these crucial questions remain unanswered, the answers to these questoins will only come with time.

One More Thing

If you enjoyed this article, please consider following me on Twitter: @natexlee.

**WhatsApp Launches New Crypto Payment Feature with Novi and USDP (USDP by Paxos)**

WhatsApp has announced the launch of a new crypto payment feature, which includes a partnership with Novi and the stablecoin USDP (formerly PAX). This feature is currently in a US-only beta phase and offers several key benefits:

**Novi’s Role**: Novi, a wallet infrastructure and regulatory compliance provider, plays a crucial role in this partnership. It ensures that the feature adheres to regulatory standards and provides a secure and user-friendly experience.

**Replacements**: This new feature replaces Diem/Facebook’s previous crypto project, which faced regulatory hurdles. The new partnership with Novi and USDP aims to address these issues and bring a more stable and reliable crypto payment solution to WhatsApp users.

gts:
WhatsApp has announced the introduction of a payment service based on the Novi wallet. Users will be able to send and receive USDP, a stablecoin from Paxos.

WhatsApp launches cryptocurrency payment service

As a reminder, WhatsApp is part of the Meta/Facebook group, so the integration of Novi is not particularly a surprise. The news was announced by Stephane Kasriel, the new CEO of Novi who replaces David Marcus, the latter having announced his departure a few days ago.

The Novi wallet, was developed in parallel with Diem, the cryptocurrency initially carried by Facebook. But it is the wallet that seems to have taken center stage: it was launched six weeks ago and is based on USDP: a stablecoin from Paxos backed by the dollar. It, too, has changed its name — it was once called PAX.

Payments in USDP directly from conversations

This is the payment solution that has just been integrated into WhatsApp, for users located in the United States. According to the official website of the project, they can now access the sending of funds directly from the conversation, as if they were sending an attachment.

Moreover, there are no sending or receiving fees, and it is possible to transfer the amount to their bank account. According to the release, payments are sent instantly from one participant to another.

Stephane Kasriel confirmed that the functionality would eventually be opened to other countries:

“The Novi pilot is still in its very early stages, so we made the decision to test this new entry point in one country to begin with, and we will expand it once we get feedback from users.”

Diem is fading?

The shift in the payment service is now particularly visible. The cryptocurrency, which until recently was called Libra, keeps running into limitations. The regulators show their teeth as soon as Diem takes a step in its development, and this despite a calculated distancing from Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg.

Before leaving the project, David Marcus had stated that the company intended to offer Diem eventually, and to integrate it with Novi. The choice of Paxos’ USDT had indeed been a way to rely on an existing cryptocurrency, and therefore less likely to trigger an outcry.

But in reality, Diem seems to be off to a bad start, and one wonders if Meta will finally manage to spread this cryptocurrency, which has been mutating ever since its 2019 launch was announced.

### Social Media Strategy
LinkedIn is a professional platform that excels in lead generation through its detailed job postings and networking features. However, for a more modern and engaging approach, we can focus on Instagram and TikTok, which are more visually appealing and user-friendly.

#### Instagram
Instagram is a powerful platform for lead generation through influencer collaborations. Here are some examples of how Instagram differs from LinkedIn in lead generation:

1. **Influencer Collaborations**: Instagram influencers can create sponsored posts that are more engaging and shareable. These posts often include hashtags, stories, and direct links to the company’s website or landing pages. For example, a beauty brand might collaborate with an influencer who posts a sponsored post with a direct link to their product page. This not only drives traffic to the site but also increases the likelihood of conversions.

2. **Hashtags and Stories**: Instagram influencers can use relevant hashtags and create engaging stories that highlight the product or service. This can increase visibility and reach, leading to more leads. For instance, a tech company might create a story showcasing a new product with a call-to-action to visit their website.

#### TikTok
TikTok is a platform that is particularly effective for short-form videos and viral content. Here are some examples of how TikTok differs from LinkedIn in lead generation:

1. **Sponsored Content**: TikTok influencers can create short, engaging videos that are perfect for lead generation. These videos often include a call-to-action at the end, directing viewers to the company’s website or landing page. For example, a fitness brand might create a TikTok video featuring a workout routine with a link to their website for more information.

2. **Hashtags and Challenges**: TikTok influencers can create challenges that encourage users to share their own content with a specific hashtag. This can increase the visibility of the brand and lead to more leads. For instance, a food brand might create a challenge where users share their favorite recipes with a specific hashtag, leading to more engagement and potential leads.

### Influencer Collaborations
Influencer collaborations are a key component of our social media strategy. Here’s a brief overview of what they look like in practice:

1. **Sponsored Posts**: These are posts created by influencers that feature your product or service. The influencers will typically post a sponsored post with a direct link to your website or landing page. This allows users to easily access more information about the product or service.

2. **Affiliate Partnerships**: These are more long-term relationships where influencers promote your products or services in exchange for a commission on sales. This can be a more sustainable and effective way to generate leads over time.

By focusing on these modern platforms and influencer collaborations, we can create a more engaging and effective social media strategy that aligns with the user’s needs and preferences.
</response>

### Step-by-Step Guide: Understanding the Light Grey Box and Button Logic

#### Light Grey Box Behavior
The light grey box in our application is a visual indicator that helps users understand the current state of a feature or process. It is typically used to highlight important information or changes. The box is light grey to signify that it is not the primary focus but still relevant.

#### Button Logic
In our application, we use a single button for both confirming and adding actions. This simplifies the user interface and reduces the number of steps required to complete tasks. Here’s how it works:

1. **Click the Button**: When you click the button, it triggers the action you intended. For example, if you want to confirm a change, you click the button. If you want to add a new item, you also click the button.

2. **Immediate Feedback**: After clicking the button, you should see immediate feedback. If the action is successful, a green checkmark will appear. If there is an error, an error message will be displayed.

#### Formulas in Simple Terms
We use a simple formula to calculate the final value of a feature based on its initial value and a change factor. The formula is:

\[ \text{Final Value} = \text{Initial Value} + (\text{Change Factor} \times \text{Initial Value}) \]

For example, if the initial value is 100 and the change factor is 0.2, the final value would be:

\[ \text{Final Value} = 100 + (0.2 \times 100) = 100 + 20 = 120 \]

This formula helps us quickly update the value based on the change factor, making the process straightforward and efficient.

### Conclusion
By following these steps, you can easily understand and use the light grey box and button logic in our application. The light grey box provides important context, while the single button for both confirming and adding actions simplifies the user experience. The simple formula ensures that value calculations are quick and accurate.

We hope this guide helps you prepare for your presentation tomorrow. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask!
</response>

The formula logic to indicate the match is not complicated, see below.

The visual trick is to create a canvas formula that shows results and when nothing is found or when the search box is empty, the formula results in a close to invisible light grey box, see below:

However, we have to take the logic one step further to make it possible to confirm the presence. We solve the issue by using the same button to confirm the guest and to — if necessary — add a new guest to the list. This goes in two steps:

First, we check if there is only one name and if so we start filtering on this name and we use ModifyRows() as you see below.

The If statement also tells us what to do if there is no match. Please note that the user has to make sure that only one name comes up. Later on in the process, we’ll solve possible human errors by deleting rows that do not contain a first or last name. Below the code to avoid incomplete records.

[DB GuestList].Filter(Firstname.IsBlank() or Lastname.IsBlank()).Formulamap(DeleteRows(CurrentValue))

So far we have the solution to check a guest. Next we show how to add a guest in case we have no match.

Add a new guest

Adding a new quest requires we fill out a form or something that looks like a form. Here we use the full screen option and we trigger this option under certain conditions. First we add the name to the column Firstname and second we open the row that contains this first name.

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
1. Increasing physical activity

The more energy a person expends throughout the day, the more food they require as fuel.

Exercise aids in the depletion of glycogen stores in the body. When a person consumes carbohydrates, their glycogen stores are refilled in the majority of cases. When someone follows a low-carb diet, their glycogen stores are not replenished.

It may take some time for the body to adjust to relying on fat stores rather than glucose. As the body adjusts, a person may become tired.

2. Significantly reducing carbohydrate intake

Ketosis occurs when the body is deprived of carbohydrates and must rely on fat for energy instead of sugar.

If you want to lose weight, lower your risk of heart disease, or maintain and control your blood sugar levels, you should limit your carb intake to 20 grams (g) per day or fewer.

This is not, however, a fixed figure. Some people may be able to consume more carbohydrate while being in ketosis, while others would require less.

3. Fasting for short periods

Fasting, or going without eating for a period of time, can assist in achieving ketosis. Many people can fall into ketosis without eating anything.

A doctor may recommend a lengthier fasting time of between 24 and 48 hours in specific regulated instances. Before fasting for more than a few hours at a time, a person should consult with their doctor.

Fat fasting is a different type of fasting. Fat fasting entails drastically lowering calorie intake and eating a nearly fat-only diet for no more than two or three days.

preliminary research

According to Trusted Source, this could help with weight loss. Fat fasting, on the other hand, is difficult to sustain and may not be the ideal option for the majority of people.

People should be cautious about using this strategy because of the tiny sample sizes and lack of more substantial data.
